description:
High school student Hodaka leaves his home on an isolated island and moves to Tokyo, but he immediately becomes broke. He lives his days in isolation, but finally finds a job as a writer for a shady occult magazine. After he starts his job, the weather has been rainy day after day. In a corner of the crowded and busy city, Hodaka meets a young woman named Hina. Due to certain circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live together, but have a cheerful and sturdy life. Hina also has a certain power: the power to stop the rain and clear the sky.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Weathering With You - Das Mädchen, das die Sonne berührte

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Restaurant
tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

node.description:
__[Website](http://www.shinkaiworks.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shinkaimakoto)__

A Japanese director, writer, producer, animator, editor, cinematographer, voice actor, manga artist, and former graphic designer. He is best known for directing _Kimi no Na wa_, and was listed by Variety as one of 10 animators to watch in 2016. However, he was displeased with the amount of attention and wide recognition the film got, as he felt that it was unfinished.

Asteroid 55222 Makotoshinkai is named after him.

RADWIMPS is a Japanese alternative rock band formed in Kanagawa, Japan.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/radwimps.official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/radwimps_jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/radwimps) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/radwimpsstaff) | [Website](https://radwimps.jp/)

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/radwimps.official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/radwimps_jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/radwimps) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/radwimpsstaff) | [Website](https://radwimps.jp/)

Noda Youjirou is a vocalist, guitarist, lyricist and composer born in Tokyo, Japan. He is a member of the band [RADWIMPS](https://anilist.co/staff/126955/RADWIMPS), and he also started a solo project under the name Illion in 2012. 

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YojiNoda1) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoji_noda/)

Youko Miki does color design and photography.
She was part of [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/) from 2001 to 2018, but has since gone freelance.
